Posts.Content: Apr 5, 2012 04:45PM Blessed58 wrote: Good luck to you also.  I'm almost done with my radiation as well.  7 more to go after today.  Did you experience any burns or blisters?  If so, did you use any hydrocortisone cream?  My skin/breast is getting darker, no pain, but itchy.
